titleStmt.title: One hundred and ninety sermons on the hundred and nineteenth Psalm preached by the late reverend and learned Thomas Manton, D.D. ; with a perfect alphabetical table directing to the principal matters contained therein.
titleStmt.author: Manton, Thomas, 1620-1677.
White, Robert, 1645-1703.
Bates, William, 1625-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T.P. &c. and are to be sold by Michael Hide, bookseller in Exon,

notesStmt.note: Contains frontispiece portrait of Thomas Manton, signed: R. White, sculpsit.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
